messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report
Sector vendor prices is currently at 150%.
The station spending power is currently 5345 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 507 Credits.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 4. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I forgot to mention earlier, but we have the BYOS. Please feel free to help Okan in anyway that you can. With that, make sure to follow their orders when constructing the shuttle. That is all.
